snippet.title: Her Majesty's SPIFFING Intro
snippet.description:
After a long and fraught political campaign on 23rd June 2016 the United Kingdom voted for 'Brexit', signalling its divorce from the European Union. What happens next is the subject of the jovial 3D adventure game, Her Majesty's SPIFFING, coming this October to Xbox One and PC.

After loosing faith in Parliament's ability to deliver on it's pre-Brexit pledges Her Majesty the Queen has decided enough is enough and that it is time for One to 'take back control'. Given Britain's strained international relations Her Majesty (ever the pragmatist) decides the only option is to turn attention beyond this little blue planet of ours and focus on the creation of a new Galactic British Empire.

More info: www.billygoat.tv
Press kit: press.billygoat.tv
